analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.dictionaryannotator.DictionaryAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Takes a plain text file with phrases as input and annotates the phrases in the CAS file. The annotation type defaults to NGram, but can be changed. The component requires that Tokens and Sentencees are annotated in the CAS. The format of the phrase file is one phrase per line, tokens are separated by space: 
this is a phrase
another phrase
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: modelLocation
configurationParameter.description: The file must contain one phrase per line - phrases will be split at " "

configurationParameter.name: modelEncoding
configurationParameter.description: The character encoding used by the model.

configurationParameter.name: annotationType
configurationParameter.description: The annotation to create on matching phases. If nothing is specified, this defaults to NGram.

configurationParameter.name: valueFeature
configurationParameter.description: Set this feature on the created annotations.

configurationParameter.name: value
configurationParameter.description: The value to set the feature configured in #PARAM_VALUE_FEATURE to.
